# externalSyncDevice

**Instance Property**

The external sync device currently being followed by this input.

## Declaration

```swift
var externalSyncDevice: AVExternalSyncDevice? { get }
```

## Discussion

This readonly property returns the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVExternalSyncDevice] instance you provided in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDeviceInput/follow(_:videoFrameDuration:delegate:)]. This property returns `nil` when an external sync device is disconnected or fails to calibrate.

## Synchronizing with external devices

- **isExternalSyncSupported**: Indicates whether the device input supports being configured to follow an external sync device.
- **follow(_:videoFrameDuration:delegate:)**: Configures the the device input to follow an external sync device at the given frame duration.
- **unfollowExternalSyncDevice()**: Discontinues external sync.
- **activeExternalSyncVideoFrameDuration**: The receiver’s external sync frame duration (the reciprocal of its frame rate) when being driven by an external sync device.
